node.title: Queensland's latest COVID scares 'closed' as Minister apologises for border rules confusion
node.description: It's been 14 days since the latest COVID scares in Queensland, prompting officials to say the threat of wider outbreaks on the Gold Coast and Goondiwindi is over.
node.content: ["The threat from Queensland's latest COVID scares has been declared over by authorities\u00a0with\u00a0the good news coming as the Health Minister apologised for confusion over border rules.", "The state has recorded no new community cases and there are just five\u00a0active cases in the state.", "Acting Chief Health Officer Peter Aitken said it had been a \"week of good things\" \u2014\u00a0the state hit the 85 per cent first dose mark and reached 7\u00a0million vaccine doses.", "He said in a weekly record,\u00a012,000 First Nations peoples were vaccinated.", "\"The other part of good news is that we have reached 14 days without cases being infectious in the community in both Gold Coast and Goondiwindi, so we've closed those off,\" he said.", "\"That's brilliant.\"", "Health Minister Yvette D'Ath also apologised this morning for the confusion around the costs of PCR tests which erupted a political stoush between the state and federal government earlier this week.", "\"I'm happy to apologise,\" Ms D'Ath said.", "\"We've made it clear there isn't a cost without needing a certificate. We don't require the certificate.", "\"A text is suitable. It's been on our border pass systems since it went live at 70 per cent.", "\"I am just pleased that people do not have to incur this cost.\"", "Since Queensland allowed interstate travellers to enter the state by when\u00a070 per cent of people over the aged of 16 had received two doses of vaccine, 4,681 people have gone into home quarantine.", "Ms\u00a0D'Ath said there has been good compliance with the home quarantine order, apart from one breach yesterday.", "\"They got fined and they've been put into hotel quarantine,\" she said.", "\"We will do random checks at the airport. We will also check people at home so there's three mechanisms we've got to check people's compliance.", "\"So far what I'm hearing is we have a very, very high rate of compliance and I thank everyone for that.\""]
